/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/Portal.dir/client/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Portal.dir/common/Window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Portal.dir/common/Sprite.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Portal.dir/common/AnimatedSprite.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Portal.dir/common/SDLSession.cpp.o  -o Portal -Wl,-Bstatic -lSDL2main -Wl,-Bdynamic -lSDL2 -lpthread -lSDL2_image
